preqs: Students must have completed 48 credit points, including AFC1030 or ACC1030.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACC1030, AFC1030} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course version {0169, 0179, D30032}

description: Over the 14 week period of full-time employment, students will be required to complete one or more specified projects. The projects will be determined by the course coordinator in consultation with the sponsor and the student undergoing the industry-based learning.
